title: Readers on the Road: Solo Travel Dispatches
text:
A SEARCH FOR personal growth. An unchecked destination on a bucket list. A weekend without plans. These are some of the reasons for going off on a solo adventure that WSJ readers gave in response to our invitation to share their experiences. For your inspiration, here is a taste of what they found.

A Personal Challenge

I chose Iceland partly because my college magazine was doing a special issue, but also because it was safe and small enough that I could explore it thoroughly in one trip. I was kind of a shy person and...
description: WSJ readers shared their experiences traveling by themselves and offer some tips to those thinking of taking the plunge.
